FOUND IN: Philip Larkin - Renowned for his deeply personal poems that often explored themes of love and mortality.
Chador - A full-body cloak worn by some Muslim women in Iran and surrounding regions, often with a head covering as well.
Dynamic - Capable of producing exciting, dynamic change; though not directly related to marquee design, some modern marquees feature changing content which can be described as dynamic.
Overact - to exaggerate or dramatize one's emotions while performing, often in an excessively humorous manner.
Earl Marshal - The senior officer in England, who presides over coronations and other significant state ceremonies.
March - to walk with regular, measured steps
Attain - to achieve or reach something desired or intended through effort, skill, or wisdom.
